code: import React from'react';import{Chart as ChartJS,CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend}from'chart.js';import{Line}from'react-chartjs-2';import{format}from'date-fns';import{ar}from'date-fns/locale';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend);const RevenueChart=_ref=>{let{orders}=_ref;if(!orders||orders.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"no-data",children:"\u0644\u0627 \u062A\u0648\u062C\u062F \u0628\u064A\u0627\u0646\u0627\u062A \u0644\u0644\u0639\u0631\u0636"});}const chartData={labels:orders.map(order=>format(new Date(order.timestamp),'dd/MM/yyyy',{locale:ar})),datasets:[{label:'سعر البيع',data:orders.map(order=>order.sellingPrice),borderColor:'#4CAF50',backgroundColor:'rgba(76, 175, 80, 0.5)',tension:0.4},{label:'سعر التكلفة',data:orders.map(order=>order.costPrice),borderColor:'#f44336',backgroundColor:'rgba(244, 67, 54, 0.5)',tension:0.4}]};const options={responsive:true,plugins:{legend:{position:'top',rtl:true,labels:{font:{family:'Tajawal'}}}},scales:{y:{beginAtZero:true,ticks:{callback:value=>`${value} د.ع`}}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{data:chartData,options:options});};export default RevenueChart;
